title: Trading My Graded Cards for Raw
author: jlehma13

posts.post_title: Trading My Graded Cards for Raw
posts.post_content:
Before I crack these out, I wanted to see if anyone might be interested in trading a raw and hopefully much, much worse condition version of the same card. Trades for the same cards only.

If any of these are upgrades for you, let's talk. Thanks

The cards below remain available:

Zach Wheat SGC authentic
Roger Bresnahan with bat SGC authentic 
Art Fromme SGC 10
Steve Evans SGC 10
Bill Burns (barely visible but there, comma on top) SGC 10
George Schirm SGC 10
Dode Criss SGC 10
Christy Mathewson white cap raw, trimmed but clean and presentable. I would take a graded example. Must be a beater.
Those cards are sweet! I wish I had a lower grade Mathewson for you. Best of luck, Mr. Jon!
I don't want to crack them out!  Someone's got some beaters.
